Fixed a couple of bugs that affected Galaxy S3 devices (and others) so v...

title: Fixed a couple of bugs that affected Galaxy S3 devices (and others) so verba.db…
message: Fixed a couple of bugs that affected Galaxy S3 devices (and others) so verba.db wasn't properly created.  If a device had more available storage than could be stored as an integer, it was reported a negative amount.  This left a zero-byte db file around, not allowing subsequent runs to complete.

message: Modified the database installation routine to prefer the SD card to internal storage.

title: - DB installation process now first calculated available storage and terminates…
message:
- DB installation process now first calculated available storage and terminates when this is insufficient.
- cleaned up dialog messages (placed in resource strings)
- cleaned up menu information text

title: On first time running the application, a progress dialog is presented explaining…
message: On first time running the application, a progress dialog is presented explaining the the dictionary is being prepared for first time use (we are decompressing and copying the database from /assets).
